alert.note: Alert for Dragoon, Mule, Huachuca and Santa Rita Mountains including Bisbee, Canelo Hills, Madera Canyon; Tucson Metro Area including Tucson, Green Valley, Marana, Vail; Upper San Pedro River Valley including Sierra Vista, Benson (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued October 05 at 8:21PM MST by NWS Tucson
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of eastern Pima, west central Cochise and northeastern Santa Cruz Counties through 900 PM MST... At 820 PM MST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 10 miles southeast of Vail, or 13 miles west of Benson, moving south at 15 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Sonoita. This includes the following highways... Interstate 10 between mile markers 293 and 295. Route 82 between mile markers 40 and 43. Route 83 near mile marker 36, and between mile markers 51 and 54. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Dragoon, Mule, Huachuca and Santa Rita Mountains including Bisbee, Canelo Hills, Madera Canyon; Tucson Metro Area including Tucson, Green Valley, Marana, Vail; Upper San Pedro River Valley including Sierra Vista, Benson
